entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 early in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
